full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### nrCan IT Services Contract: Microsoft 365 Implementation

### Reference Information
* Reference Number: cb-4670-92432298
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: NRCan/RNCan-5000069994
* Publication Date: 2023-04-20
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-30T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-20
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

### Tender Details
* **Contract Type:** Fully Funded Services Contract
* **Service Category:** Information Technology Consultation Services (UNSPC 80101507)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Trade Agreements
* This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Geographic Scope
* The contract will be delivered across Canada and internationally (worldwide).
* Specific regions of opportunity include the National Capital Region (NCR) and potentially other locations within Canada.

### Contracting Entity
* **Contracting Agency:** Natural Resources Canada (RNCan)
* **Contracting Entity Address:**
	+ Address: 580 Booth St.
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: ON
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0E4
	+ Country: Canada

### Specification and Supporting Documents
* The full tender notice, including all required details and terms, is available for download [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4670/174297--nrcan-5000066694-npp.pdf).

### Important Notes
* This tender announcement is now expired. Bidders should not submit their proposals after the tender
